expand.description: Optional additional items to return in the `_embedded` object. Currently supports the value `enrollments`.

IdpPushNotificationChallenge.description: Push notification challenge request object for an app authenticator

challenge.description: JWT issued by Okta at the time of challenging for a push notification.  This based64-encoded JWT consists of a [JWT header](/openapi/okta-myaccount/myaccount/tag/AppAuthenticator/#tag/AppAuthenticator/schema/PushNotificationChallengeRequestJwtHeader) and a [JWT payload](/openapi/okta-myaccount/myaccount/tag/AppAuthenticator/#tag/AppAuthenticator/schema/PushNotificationChallengeRequestJwt).

IdpPushNotificationVerificationInput.description: Push notification challenge response object for an app authenticator

challengeResponse.description: JWT issued by the app authenticator at the time of push notification verification  This based64-encoded JWT consists of a [JWT header](/openapi/okta-myaccount/myaccount/tag/AppAuthenticator/#tag/AppAuthenticator/schema/PushNotificationChallengeResponseJwtHeader) and a [JWT payload](/openapi/okta-myaccount/myaccount/tag/AppAuthenticator/#tag/AppAuthenticator/schema/PushNotificationChallengeResponseJwt).
